title: Volunteer Income Tax Assistance (VITA) and Tax Counseling for the Elderly (TCE)
text: Volunteer Income Tax Assistance (VITA) and Tax Counseling for the Elderly (TCE) The IRS offers two free basic tax return preparation programs to qualified individuals. Volunteer Income Tax Assistance (VITA) VITA helps people prepare their own tax returnsâ€”for free! VITA volunteers help: - people who meet income requirements set by each VITA location in New York State - persons with disabilities - taxpayers with limited proficiency in English Note: Income limits vary at different VITA locations. Check with the location nearest you to confirm. Tax Counseling for the Elderly (TCE) TCE offers free tax help to taxpayers specializing in questions about pensions and retirement-related issues unique to seniors. For more information about the IRS VITA and TCE programs, visit Free tax preparation for qualifying taxpayers. To find a VITA or TCE location near you, use the locator tool below or call 800-906-9887. NYC residents, visit NYC Free Tax Prep. Find a location Resources Updated:
